message.content:
{"id": "18268", "title": "Bug 18268 not finding images and files in NL-specific subdirectories", "description": "When attempting to open the about dialog in Eclipse, the main image is not displayed. This issue arises when following the steps below:

1. Start Eclipse
2. Delete <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/eclipselg.gif>
3. Edit <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/about.ini> and change the value of the aboutImage property to 'aboutImage=$nl$/eclipselg.gif'
4. Edit <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/about.ini> and change the value of the aboutImage property to 'aboutImage=nl/en/eclipselg.gif'
5. Open the about dialog

Upon observation, it is evident that the UI correctly passes the entire path to IPluginDescriptor.find, but the '$nl$' path segment is not handled correctly, resulting in the main image not being displayed.", "OB": "Open the about dialog and observe that the main image is not displayed.", "EB": "The UI should handle the '$nl$' path segment correctly and display the main image in the about dialog.", "SR": "Implement proper handling of the '$nl$' path segment in the UI to ensure that the main image is displayed correctly in the about dialog."}

origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '18268', 'title': 'Bug 18268not finding images and files in NLspecific subdirectories', 'description': 'Bug 18268not finding images and files in NLspecific subdirectories build 200205291235Setup Start eclipse. Delete <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/eclipselg.gif3. Edit <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/about.iniChange the value of the aboutImage property:aboutImage=$nl$/eclipselg.gif4. Edit <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/about.iniChange the value of the aboutImage property:aboutImage=nl/en/eclipselg.gif7. Open the about dialogObserve: There is a main image again.This suggests that the UI is correctly passing the entire pathto IPluginDescriptor.find, but that the "$nl$" path segment is not beinghandled correctly. ', 'OB': 'Open the about dialog Observe: There is a main image. ', 'EB': '', 'SR': ''}
